definition: storytelling dramatic art dating back to Song and Yuan periods, single narrator without music, often historical topics with commentary
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]

sentences.english: Historical Pinghua has much bearing on the novel Romance of the Three Kingdoms.
sentences.chinese: 講史平話與《三國演義》成書的關係十分密切。

sentences.english: This paper studies the phonology of the Pinghua dialect of Hunan Province's Tongdao County and lists the homophones.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹湖南通道平話的音系，並列出同音字匯。

sentences.english: The second part is divided into the Pinghua passive tags on it.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分爲桂北平話被動標記研究。

sentences.english: The second chapter, we describe the system of verb classifiers.
sentences.chinese: 第二章，對《平話》中動量詞系統進行分類描寫。

sentences.english: The third part is researched disposal tag of the Pinghua .
sentences.chinese: 第三部分是桂北平話處置標記研究。

sentences.english: Jiangshi Pinghua in Song and Yuan Dynasty literature has always been considered as the scripts of Jiangshi.
sentences.chinese: 宋元講史平話一直被認爲是講史的話本。

sentences.english: Baise Pinhua mountain songs are an important form of folk arts for the Baise people who speak the Pinghua dialect.
sentences.chinese: 百色平話山歌是百色平話人民間文藝的一種重要形式。

sentences.english: Baise Pinhua mountain songs are an important form of folk arts for the Baise people who speak the Pinghua dialect.
sentences.chinese: 百色平話山歌是百色平話人民間文藝的一種重要形式。

sentences.english: A dialect called "Guanxia Pinghua" is spoken among Miao minority in Suining county of Hunan province.
sentences.chinese: 湖南綏寧縣境內關峽苗族鄉流行一種“平話”。
